name: Cream eBooks
tag_list: ebooks, epub, epub3, digital-books, apps, mobile, html5, touchy-friendly, publishing, publishers, authors, illustration, digital-picture-books, picture-books, interactive-books
description: Publish and sell your digital books
overview:
We ♥ Design, Tech & Books. We are a small team of passionate and creative people. We made ePub3 eBooks, iBooks Author TextBooks, Apps and fine development for all kind of digital publications. We’ve added a few awesome people who share our passion for design, illustration, eBooks, technology and above all simple and beautiful things.

We’re now launching Byeink. Byeink is a web-app that helps authors and publishers to create, manage & sell eBooks in a very easy way. And many people will be able to publish and sell its first eBook.

With Byeink you can: · Create and edit awesome looking eBooks · Distribute through social payment, promote your eBooks by Chapters · Sell with Paypal and achieve up to 100% of royalties · Watch your sales and stats with a visual dashboard; know your readers. · All in the cloud, “frustration-free” web-app · Sign and sell ebooks on the go, from mobile devices and tablets

offices.address1: STC Spain Tech Center. 181 Fremont Street

video_embeds.description: The Best of the World - Made in ePub3
